td.content: s:male aged 42 Ys presents with moderate b/l leg pain, moderate pain in extremities unrelated to movement or posture and moderate recurrent chest pain for past 12 days. o:Height 180 cm, Weight 52.1 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed fentanyl PCA - 50 mcg/hour IV PCA, and ordered Hemoglobin electrophoresis, Hand XRY.

s:pt presents with mild abdominal pain. pt also reports moderate weight loss, moderate dark urine. he is a 42 year old M geographer. o:Height 181 cm, Weight 54.4 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Pancreatic Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed gemcitabine - 1000 mg/m2 IV, and ordered CT Abdomen.

s:pt presents with Heart for about 3 days. patient is a white male aged 42 years. he consumes 2 drinks per night he denies smoking o:Height 180 cm, Weight 53 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Tachycardia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed nifedipine - 10 mg daily, and ordered ECG.

s:a 43 yo male C/O Heart. NKDA. he denies smoking describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 3 years in his past o:Height 181 cm, Weight 53.6 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 15 a:Tachycardia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.

s:pt presents with 4 weeks history of worsening Heart. pt is a white m aged 43 years. o:Height 181 cm, Weight 53.9 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16 a:Tachycardia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed nifedipine - 10 mg daily, and ordered Pericardiocentesis - pericardial space.
